Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Report for the Department of Trade and Industry (UK), London - ‘A literature review on skills and innovation: How does successful innovation impact on the demand for skills and how do skills drive innovation?'
Report for the UK Intellectual Property Office, London - 'The impact of the Patent System on SMEs’
Report for the UK Council for Industry and Higher Education (CIHE), London - ‘The UK R&D Landscape’
Report for the UK Council for Industry and Higher Education (CIHE), London - ‘Enhancing Collaboration, creating value’

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: BEST PAPER AWARD, 25th DRUID Celebration Conference ‘Entrepreneurship and Innovation’, Copenhagen Business School, 17-20th June 2008

BEST PAPERS PROCEEDINGS, 2013 Academy of Management Meeting, Lake Buena Vista, Orlando, 9-13th August. Paper: Mina, A.; Bascavusoglu-Moreau, E., Hughes, A. 2013 ‘Exploiting knowledge flows: Openness and the innovative performance of business services’, Best Paper Proceedings, 2013 Academy of Management Meeting. ISSN 1543-8643.
BEST PAPER AWARD, CONCORDi-2013 Conference, JRC-IPTS/European Commission, Seville, 26-27th September

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Referee for: JOURNALS: Cambridge Journal of Economics, Economics of Innovation and New Technology, Health Economics, Journal of Economics and Statistics, Journal of Evolutionary Economics, Journal of Chinese Economic and Business Studies, Industrial and Corporate Change, Industry and Innovation, Organization Science, Organisation Studies, Oxford Economic Papers, Public Management Review, Regional Studies, Research Evaluation, Research Policy, R&D Management, Science and Public Policy, Spatial Economic Analysis, Systems Research and Behavioural Science, Technological Forecasting and Social Change, Technovation, Telecommunications Policy. PUBLISHERS: Cambridge University Press, Palgrave Macmillan.
Seminar - CESPRI Seminar Series, Bocconi University, Milan
Seminar - Friedrich Schiller University/Max Planck Institute for Economics Seminar Series, Jena
Seminar - Manchester Institute of Innovation Research, University of Manchester
Industry Session Chair - UK~IRC Innovation Summit, Imperial College Business School/IBM, Hursley, UK
Invited Senior Discussant - DRUID Academy Conference 2012, The Moeller Centre, University of Cambridge, Cambridge.
Seminar - INGENIO, Spanish Council for Scientific Research/Polytechnic University of Valencia, Valencia.
Seminar - SPRU-CENTRIM Freeman Centre Seminar Series, University of Sussex, Brighton

Media coverage: Research Policy paper ‘Venture capital investments and the technological performance of portfolio firms’: San Francisco Chronicle (11 December 2015); Business Weekly (14 December 2015); Cambridge Network (15 December 2015). UK-IRC/CIHE ‘UK R&D Landscape’ Report: The Guardian (13 May 2014); Finfacts (23 June 2012).

International academic services: Internal PhD Examiner (University of Cambridge), External PhD Examiner (University of Manchester; University of Aalborg), Engineering Studies Tripos IIA Group Examiner (University of Cambridge)
Seminar - University of Turin, Collegio Carlo Alberto, Economics of Innovation and Knowledge Seminar Series, Turin.
Seminar - University of Southampton Business School, Southampton.
Seminar, EPFL - Ecole Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne, Institute of Technology and Public Policy/College of Management of Technology Seminar Series, Lausanne.

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Senior Research Fellow of the Centre for Business Research (CBR), University of Cambridge
University Lecturer in Economics of Innovation, Cambridge Judge Business School
Director of Economic Studies of St Edmund's College, University of Cambridge
Research Associate of the Centre for Business Research, University of Cambridge
Fellow of the Judge Business School, University of Cambridge

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Senior Research Fellow of the Centre for Business Research (CBR), University of Cambridge

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Co-Principal Investigator of the ‘Cambridge Integrated Knowledge Centre for Photonics and Electronics’ Commercialisation Lab, UK Engineering and Physical Science Research Council (EPSRC).

Co-investigator of the 'Service Innovation' Project UK Innovation Research Centre (Cambridge and Imperial College London). Funders: UK Department for Business, Innovation and Skills (BIS), the Economic and Social Research Council (ESRC), the National Endowment for Science, Technology and the Arts (NESTA) and the Technology Strategy Board (TSB)

Leader of the ‘Capital Markets and Innovation: Financing Business Experimentation in Europe’ Work Package 3 of project FINNOV – Finance, Innovation and Growth: Changing Patterns and Policy Implications, EC 7th Framework Programme, 2009-2012 (Socio-economic Sciences and Humanities, grant agreement n° 217466).
